effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type changes depending on the kind of plate held by the user.
